timeline.bodyText: Could we have an explicit test of event having the signature expected by external tools? ie, an assert equals against a calculated hash. So, we could be sure the event is consumible and queryable by external tools, using a code test. My concert is that, if we apply fuzzy testing to the event function code (and then, changing the resulting signature), all these tests could pass in green
timeline.author: ajlopezrsk

replies.bodyText: @ajlopezrsk has a good point here. We are doing this though in the integration tests already, so we can leave this comment as tech debt to be solved by the fed team afterwards
